def: To act; to conduct; to bear or carry one's self; as, to behavewell or ill.
A blue coloring matter found in the pus from old sores,supposed to be formed through the agency of a species of bacterium(Bacillus pyocyaneus).C13H10N2O
In a remiss or negligent manner; carelessly.

Of or pertaining to measurement by weight; measured by weight.-- Grav"i*met"ric*al*ly, adv. Gravimetric analysis (Chem.), analysisin which the amounts of the coastituents are determined by weight; --in distinction from volumetric analysis.
Away from the mesial plane of the body; lateral. Externalangles. (Geom.) See under Angle.
The quality or state of being sober.
The science or study of antiquities, esp. prehistoricantiquities, such as the remains of buildings or monuments of anearly epoch, inscriptions, implements, and other relics, writtenmanuscripts, etc.

Any fish of the family Pleuronectid√¶; esp., the winter flounder(Pleuronectes Americanus). The flatfishes have the body flattened,swim on the side, and have eyes on one side, as the flounder, turbot,and halibut. See Flounder.
Related by marriage; from the same source.
An animal having only two digits.
